data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Dutra, Guilherme Moreira, Penido, Iago De Souza, Pessali, Tiago Casarim, Netto-Ferreira, Andre Luiz (2017): Ressurrection of Curimatus albula Lütken (Characiformes: Curimatidae), a senior synonym of Cyphocharax lundi Dutra, Penido, Mello & Pessali. Zootaxa 4344 (3), DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.4344.3.1
